name: DEAD FUSION [Demo for Beginner Circle Jam]
name_original: DEAD FUSION [Demo for Beginner Circle Jam]
description:
Your name is X2-25. You are a space bounty hunter. After a close encounter with an unknown alien being, your suit has been modified, allowing you to shoot powerful heat and anti-heat projectiles. Your suit, however, is also not capable of fully sustaining sharp changes in heat, so be wise in your use of your new-found abilities. In your search for the being that did this to you, you've shipwrecked into an unknown planet, and now, you have to find your way out. 

This game is better experienced in full-screen mode.

CONTROLS:

  • W, A, S, D to move.
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot.
  • Q to switch between projectiles.
  • Space to shoot missiles (if the missile addon has been found).
  • Look around with the mouse cursor.

This game was made for Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1, with the theme "Temperature is key".
